text: Wathi uMûsâ: O Nkosi! Wena Uphe uFir’awn neenkosi zakhe ubunewunewu nobutyebi bobomi beli hlabathi, Nkosi yethu! Ngabo obo (butyebi babo) balahlekise abantu eNdleleni yaKho. Nkosi yethu! Butshabalalise ubutyebi babo, Uqaqadekise iintliziyo zabo, khona ukuze bangakholwa de babone isohlwayo esibuhlungu.”
